mapper.select: SELECT E.EMP_NO, E.EMP_NAME, E.EMP_STREET, E.EMP_DETAIL , P.POS_NAME FROM EMPLOYEE_T E INNER JOIN POSITION_T P ON E.POS_NO = P.POS_NO WHERE 1=1 AND EMP_NO = #{empNo}

SELECT TIME_OFF_TEMP_NO , TIME_OFF_CT_NO , TO_CHAR(TIME_OFF_START_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS TIME_OFF_START_DT , TO_CHAR(TIME_OFF_END_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS TIME_OFF_END_DT , TIME_OFF_PERIOD , TIME_OFF_CONTENT FROM TIME_OFF_TEMP_T WHERE 1=1 AND EMP_NO = #{empNo} AND TIME_OFF_CT_NO = #{timeOffCtNo}

SELECT E.EMP_NO, E.EMP_NAME , P.POS_NO, P.POS_NAME FROM EMPLOYEE_T E INNER JOIN FRANCHISE_T F ON E.FRN_NO = F.FRN_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN POSITION_T P ON E.POS_NO = P.POS_NO WHERE 1=1 AND F.FRN_NO = #{frnNo} AND DECODE ( (SELECT POS_NO FROM EMPLOYEE_T WHERE EMP_NO = #{empNo}) , 2, 2 , 1 ) > P.POS_NO ORDER BY P.POS_NO ASC , E.EMP_NAME ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TIME_OFF_T ( APPR_NO , TIME_OFF_CT_NO , TIME_OFF_START_DT , TIME_OFF_END_DT , TIME_OFF_PERIOD , TIME_OFF_CONTENT ) VALUES ( #{apprNo} , #{timeOffCtNo} , TO_DATE(#{timeOffStartDt}) , TO_DATE(#{timeOffEndDt}) , #{timeOffPeriod} , #{timeOffContent})
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT A.APPR_NO , TO_CHAR(A.APPR_DT, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일"') AS APPR_DT , TO_CHAR(T.TIME_OFF_START_DT, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일"') AS TIME_OFF_START_DT , TO_CHAR(T.TIME_OFF_END_DT, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일"') AS TIME_OFF_END_DT , T.TIME_OFF_CT_NO, T.TIME_OFF_PERIOD, T.TIME_OFF_CONTENT , E.EMP_NO, E.EMP_NAME, E.EMP_STREET, E.EMP_DETAIL, E.EMP_SIGN , P.POS_NAME FROM APPROVAL_T A INNER JOIN TIME_OFF_T T ON A.APPR_NO = T.APPR_NO INNER JOIN EMPLOYEE_T E ON A.EMP_NO = E.EMP_NO INNER JOIN POSITION_T P ON E.POS_NO = P.POS_NO INNER JOIN APPR_LINE_T L ON A.APPR_NO = L.APPR_NO WHERE 1=1 AND ( (E.EMP_NO = #{empNo} AND A.APPR_NO = #{apprNo}) OR L.APPR_LINE_NO = ( SELECT APPR_LINE_NO FROM APPR_LINE_T WHERE 1=1 AND APPR_NO = #{apprNo} AND EMP_NO = #{empNo}) )

SELECT L.APPR_LINE_STAT, L.APPR_SIGN , E.EMP_NO, E.EMP_NAME, E.EMP_SIGN , P.POS_NAME FROM APPR_LINE_T L INNER JOIN EMPLOYEE_T E ON L.EMP_NO = E.EMP_NO INNER JOIN POSITION_T P ON E.POS_NO = P.POS_NO WHERE 1=1 AND L.APPR_NO = #{apprNo} ORDER BY L.APPR_LINE_ORDER ASC

SELECT A.APPR_NO, A.APPR_STAT , TO_CHAR(A.APPR_DT, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일"') AS APPR_DT , O.ORDER_COST , F.FRN_NO, F.FRN_NAME, F.FRN_OWNER, F.FRN_TEL, F.FRN_STREET, F.FRN_DETAIL , E.EMP_SIGN FROM APPROVAL_T A INNER JOIN ORDER_T O ON A.APPR_NO = O.APPR_NO INNER JOIN EMPLOYEE_T E ON A.EMP_NO = E.EMP_NO INNER JOIN FRANCHISE_T F ON E.FRN_NO = F.FRN_NO WHERE 1=1 AND A.APPR_NO = #{apprNo}

SELECT SO.STOCK_ORDER_COUNT, SO.STOCK_ORDER_COST , S.STOCK_NAME, S.STOCK_UNIT, S.STOCK_PRICE , SC.STOCK_CT_NAME FROM STOCK_ORDER_T SO INNER JOIN STOCK_T S ON SO.STOCK_NO = S.STOCK_NO INNER JOIN STOCK_CATEGORY_T SC ON S.STOCK_CT_NO = SC.STOCK_CT_NO WHERE 1=1 AND SO.APPR_NO = #{apprNo} ORDER BY S.STOCK_NAME ASC
